activity.title: coronasafe/care_fe#7342
activity.text:
@rithviknishad When using `devdistrictadmin` on staging deployment, the default presets doesn't update for some reason. When we refresh the page, the last location of camera is available however on selecting the same default preset again, we are sent back to old position. The patient presets seems to work fine. Is it supposed to happen?

https://github.com/coronasafe/care_fe/assets/63492939/af4d8ffc-1287-4c41-ba04-0f10de3c8c5a

activity.title: coronasafe/care_fe#7342
activity.text: @Ashesh3 it does seem to work fine in my case.  After updating a preset, I switched to a different preset, and then switched back to the updated preset, the updated preset was as expected without refreshing the page.

activity.title: coronasafe/care_fe#7231
activity.text:
@nihal467 I found this workflow which can be used with our existing stale workflow to solve this issue. Do you take a look at it. https://github.com/BoundfoxStudios/action-unassign-contributor-after-days-of-inactivity

Other approach I could think of was writing manual CLI commands to unassign issues.
